amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section requiring a study and report to Congress on the availability and effectiveness of treatment for incarcerated and nonincarcerated perpetrators of sex offenses against children and on the effectiveness of probation and parole supervision in reducing rates of recividism of sex offenses against children.

action.text: Mr. Sensenbrenner raised a point of order against the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003). Mr. Sensenbrenner stated that the amendment exceeded the scope of the bill and was not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
